Interactive representation of microstructures

Hover or click on data points

References and links

  1. Materials Informatics in general:
    S.R. Kalidindi, Hierarchical Materials Informatics: Novel Analytics for Materials Data, 2015 (book)
  2. Two-point statistics:
    Cecen, Fast, and Kalidindi, IMMI 5 (2016) 1-15
  3. Homogenization:
    Gupta et al., Acta Mater. 91 (2015) 239-254.
  4. Spherical nanoindentation:
    Pathak and Kalidindi, MSE R: Reports 91 (2015) 1-36.
